casebody.data:
Rickey Allen BRIGHT
v.
STATE. No. 362P02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 29, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of July 2004 by Plaintiff to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of July 2004."
